JUPT DocumentationÔÉÅ

The Juno Universal Plotting Tool is an all in one tool for creating and customising plots of many combinations of data from the Juno spacecraft, currently including magnetometer (MAG), radio wave (Waves), plasma (JADE) and Trajectory data.
